main event: A person observed a large, metallic, disc-shaped object traveling from north to south over Harrisburg, Pennsylvania on July 20, 1969.
interesting points: The object was initially traveling slowly, then made some erratic maneuvers and appeared to be in trouble, speeding up and getting out of sight within a couple of minutes.
The object was a bright metallic color, disc-shaped, and about 50 feet in diameter, and made no sound.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 1,000 to 2,000 feet.
The witness was interested in UFOs but did not want to be labeled a 'nut', so they did not report the sighting to the Air Force.
The witness was only 12 years old at the time of the sighting.
